index.name: elixir
index.subtitle: Elixir
index.about: Elixir is a functional, meta-programming aware language built on top of the Erlang VM. It is a dynamic language that focuses on tooling to leverage Erlang's abilities to build concurrent, distributed and fault-tolerant applications with hot code upgrades.
index.description: Read the best free ebooks about Elixir language.

books.title: Elixir Succinctly
books.description: Author Emanuele DelBono guides readers along the first steps of mastering the Elixir programming language in Elixir Succinctly. Providing a brief overview of Elixirâ€™s history and purpose and clear instructions to create an app with Elixir, DelBono makes it easy for developers who wish to add a new language to their repertoire.
books.author: Emanuele DelBono
